channel.title: [Performance] c2a5g (Surface Tension)
channel.description:
What ever I do I can't get more then 10 fps on this map. I set everything to there lowest values, disabled fog and particles and still.
Usually get 60-120 fps in Black Mesa, but ugh. Anyone find any fixes for this map, or am I stuck till a patch comes out ?.
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96220333[/url] It's the map with the mortar on it, which I'm also having issues with.
Edit: Here's a pic of what the mortar looks like for me. [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96242300[/url]
The crosshair/red dot is not showing up, cut off or just impossible to see with the static effect.

item.title: [Performance] c2a5g (Surface Tension)
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Please, follow bug reporting guidelines posted here: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=488838&postcount=1

And include complete hardware and software specs of your system when you report the problem. You could find instructions on how to enable showbudget panel in Question 9 of the BM FAQ.

Read full topic

item.title: [Performance] c2a5g (Surface Tension)
item.dc:creator: AceOfSpades
item.description:
I have exactly the same problem here. Everything on low (usually on high), 10 fps and I can’t call the airstrike, I can’t even change weapons if it’s not on fast switch.

Read full topic

item.title: [Performance] c2a5g (Surface Tension)

What ever I do I can’t get more then 10 fps on this map.
I set everything to there lowest values, disabled fog and particles and still.
